all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And again, verily I say unto you, that whoso forbiddeth to marry is not ordained of God, for marriage is ordained of God unto man.
Doctrine and Covenants 49:15
Quote of the Day
"You may wonder if your Heavenly Father loves you. The answer is a resounding, absolute yes!"
Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
